body.name: Novogratz Tallulah Memory Foam Futon, Convertible Couch, Green Velvet
features: Classic vintage design in velvet upholstery with button-tufted arms and back and wooden legs
Made on a sturdy wood frame with filling made of high-density foam and memory foam for ultimate comfort
Multi-functional design. The back can be reclined to lounging and sleeping position
Available in blue, grey, green and pink velvet. Ships in one box and it is easy to assemble
Futon dimensions: 83”L x 33.5”W x 32.5”H. Sleeping dimensions: 73”L x 44”W x 17.5”H. Weight limit: 600 lb.
body.description: The Novogratz Tallulah Memory Foam Futon is exactly what you need and more! Bringing elegance and sophistication into your home with its vintage silhouette, rounded lines and button-tufted details. Designed with a soft velvet upholstery, this piece of furniture is both compact and multi-functional. Made with a sturdy wood frame, the Tallulah Memory Foam Futon is designed to offer nothing but superior comfort! The seat cushions are filled with high-density foam and responsive memory foam that will cradle your body to help relieve pressure points while you are watching TV or taking a much needed afternoon nap. The backrest features a split-back design that can be independently reclined to convert between multiple positions: sitting, lounging and sleeping. In other words, this means that you will now have an extra bed for overnight guests! Available in multiple colors, the Novogratz Tallulah Memory Foam Futon is finished with slanted wooden legs to add a last touch of chic style!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Creating a boutique experience for the modern family. For over 25 years, husband and wife design duo Cortney and Robert Novogratz have been designing and developing spaces around the world. The Novogratzes' love of design, art, and architecture have driven their careers - they've rebuilt entire city blocks, renovated a Hollywood Hills castle, and built a treehouse in Brazil, amongst other cool projects. Their impeccable taste and commitment to attainability bring high-end design to the masses. The family currently resides in the Hollywood Hills with their seven children (Wolfgang, Bellamy, Tallulah, Breaker, Five, Holleder and Major). They're thrilled to launch a line of products designed to bring energy, comfort and cool into your home.

Home is Where the Art is Bring the focal point to a statement piece with a modern or vintage inspired futon. It's All About the Details Thoughtful construction and attention to detail make these furniture pieces stand out. Inspired by Family Durability, affordability and functionality keep your home fun and carefree without compromising on style! Designed with You in Mind From modern to chic and vintage-inspired, the Novogratz collection is sure to have something unique to your needs.

Novogratz Futons & Sectionals From modern to vintage-inspired, there’s a Novogratz futon, sectional or sleeper sofa to fit your quirky and fun lifestyle. Novogratz Upholstered Beds With an impeccable combination of charm and contemporary design, our sturdy beds offer superior support with a superior bentwood slat system. Novogratz Metal Beds Stylish and classy, our metal beds have a clean silhouette and are crafted in sturdy metal to provide you top support. Novogratz Daybeds These 3-in-1 pieces can be used a sofa, bed or guest bed, bringing functionality and versatility to your home. Futons, Sectionals, Sleepers Upholstered Beds Metal Beds Daybeds

Novogratz Tallulah Daybed Novogratz Tallulah Futon Novogratz Tallulah Chair Novogratz Brittany Turntable Stand Novogratz Brittany End Table Novogratz Brittany Bookcase Available Colors Gray, Blue, Pink Mustard, Gray, Blue, Pink, Green, Light Green Mustard, Gray, Blue, Pink, Green, Light Green Walnut Walnut Walnut Dimensions Daybed dimensions: 85.5”L x 48”W x 37”H. Trundle dimensions: 75”L x 40”W x 11.5”H Futon dimensions: 83”L x 33.5”W x 32.5”H. Sleeping dimensions: 73”L x 44”W x 17.5”H Chair dimensions: 34”L x 32.5”W x 32.5”H Turntable dimensions: 30”H x 19.88”W x 17.72”D End table dimensions: 23.625”H x 21.625”W x 18.75”D Bookcase dimensions: 54.75”H x 31.5”W x 11.75”D

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good compromise for a great price
reviews.reviewText: I spent way too much time shopping for a small sofa for my new much smaller space. I bought this particular sofa/futon partly due to the reviews the color (green) and it was also on sale. The box it arrived in threw me off because there was only one and it was big but not as big as I would have thought. The couch is hinged on the middle! Assembly was opening it, attaching the arm rests and legs. Super easy!The color was spot on with no surprises. The size was true. It looks great! The seat isn't deep but it's acceptable. The cushion is firm, but I find it comfortable. Putting the back down to make it into a bed is easy. I'm 5"11 and can stretch out without worry. I have slept on it and I can't complain. Not perfect but more than I expected I have been using it for almost three months and it's holding up great. I recommend a lint rake/defuzzing tool to smooth the fabric and in my case to also remove cat hair. The dog drool cleans up easy with a damp cloth as well.I'm glad I chose it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very stylish, comfortable couch with fairly deep seats! Total value for money!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this around 1 year back and I am very happy with my purchase. I have the mustard colour one and it looks very chic and modern. It looks better than the pictures for sure.Pros -1. Easy to assemble.2. Very. good looking. It honestly looks like a way more expensive couch.2. Fairly comfortable though on the firmer side. The memory foam does sink in a bit. I will say it is comfortable in the way it supports the body.3. Fairly deep seats making lounging comfortable. I am a 6' 2 guy and I find it great to lounge inCons -1. Its a 300 usd couch so its not the sink-in super comfortable type.2. In the sleeping position it is only usable on one side. Everyone who has slept on this couch did not bother opening it into the bed position. However even in the couch form it is great to sleep on.tldr; This is a great first couch and you will not regret it. Get a couple of pillows if you want to make it more comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars VERY CUTE! Assemble with 2 people | MEMORY FOAM cushions - not cushy
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this couch as a temporary solution in my new apartment. I want to get a sectional or something that reclines eventually.I have gotten SO many compliments on this couch and many people want to purchase it from me when I get my new couch.ProsSoft fabricPrettySturdyPackaging was incredibleArms of couch come in the back of the couch. Unzip and there they are!Reclining the back is easyNot sure if it is by design or meant to be used this way, but you can adjust the back angle I know the purpose is for it to fold into a bed, but still pretty neat to be able to recline a little.ConsLike other reviews said, it is very firm.The cushions are a little squished from being in the box. Hoping they will expand over time.Assembly is a bear by yourself.116lbs - which complicates the assembly if you are aloneOverall, I would recommend! Product quality is very nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Actually not so bad
reviews.reviewText: I searched high and low for an affordable comfy futon and couldn’t make a confident decision. Since we needed one, this one was highly rated and although not 100% sold that I was going to like it — we went for it — and glad we did! Although I believe I paid more for this than I should have, I’m satisfied with it.It was pretty easy to put together. It comes in one large large large box, and removing it was pretty straightforward. Turning it over felt a bit uneasy but it was ok —- just make sure at least 2 of you to put together! The velvet felt nice, first velvet furniture I’ve had, and the light green color was a nice change for our small apartment. It is quite firm, but all of us have felt comfy takings a nap or a full night sleep in it so far. My son has even jumped up and down on it more than I would like, and it has held without sagging. So far so good. I give it 5 stars bc it met all my expectations. There are legs on the back of the seat when you lay the futon all the way back, and so far no tipping issues. Good luck if you decide to also get one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this thing
reviews.reviewText: This was incredibly easy to put together and came with all the tools needed! I absolutely adore the piece, it's so soft, comfortable, sturdy, and stylish. It was the perfect addition to my new apartment, I only wish I got more fun color but they were all out of stock- go figure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Solid Futon - Terrible Delivery Process
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this futon after researching most of the other options on amazon. The futon is great for the price. It definitely is not comfortable enough to sleep on without a mattress pad. The backrests that you lower to turn into a futon are at a lower level than the front cushions- so you would be sleeping at an angle.The futon is generally comfortable but very firm. The memory foam is not the squishy type that bends to your pressure like you would expect in a mattress.It was very easy to assemble. I assembled it in about 40ish minutes on my own (5'5" female - not hard to flip around. Too heavy for me to carry the box it came in though).The color is true to the photos. The velvet has some damage that looks like someone scratched it too hard, but it is not super evident. There are many loose threads that I had to cut off.The delivery process for this item was the worst I have encountered on Amazon. They rescheduled my delivery 3 times, and I had to call Amazon four times to figure out when this package would arrive. They actively dodged my questions and did not supply me with any helpful or accurate information. When you select a delivery time you choose a 3-hour window, and when they rescheduled my delivery the window I chose was not respected. 2 of the times they rescheduled my delivery, the delivery window they chose was between 3 am and 6 am. My delivery finally arrived at 6:10 am. I paid the additional $20 to have it delivered up the 2 flights of stairs to my apartment, and the delivery driver "rolled" the box up the stairs- lifting it up and then dropping it onto the stairs. This was so loud (it's a ~150lb box) that I am sure it woke up all of my neighbors. Luckily it did not damage the futon. Terrible delivery experience, would not recommend it.
Bought this for my smaller living room with limited seating. Love how I can stretch out with room to spare. It’s quite firm ,just how I like it
Il est juste parfait (attention de bien ajouter un imperméabilisant pour velour car il tache facilement)
